title: Hextech Crafting is now live in Oceania!

replies.body: When will this become available to the Oce servers?
It's already live, as per the title of the post :P

That's correct.
Even if you didn't get an S with that champion?!?! Thats sooo messed up! Thats 48 champions you cannot use when your getting chests till next season!

Ok now I'm confused by your comment. What do you mean by, "Thats 48 champions you cannot use when your getting chests till next season!"?

Maybe I have misread your previous post. 

I have copied and pasted the info about Hextech Chests below for clarity {{summoner:13}}  (from the guide, https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide )

"Earn these through achieving a Mastery rank of S or higher, or purchase them in the store for RP. A chest requires a key to open, and will contain a shard and possibly some amount of essence (more on all that later). Some details:

- You can earn up to four chests at a time, with one chest slot regenerating each week. Purchasing chests doesn’t contribute to this limit, so even after earning four chests in a week, you can purchase another. You can purchase up to 25 chests per day.
- Once you earn a chest from achieving S rank on a champion, you won’t be able to earn another with that champion until the end of the season. You can see which champions you’ve earned chests with in your profile’s Champions tab. This chest cap resets each season.
- If someone in your premade group earns an S rank, you’ll receive a chest as well! The chest you receive is tied to the champion you’re playing, so that champion will be unable to earn more chests for this season.
- You can only earn chests if you're playing a champion you own. So, if you rent a champion or play an unowned champion on the free rotation, you won't be able to earn a chest with them. However, if your premade partner earns an S rank on a champion they don't own, you can still earn a chest from their S rank as long as you own the champion you're playing."
Can we get keys from ARAM?

Not come across anyone who has earned a key fragment from ARAM wins, some players have won 20 games and not dropped a key fragment as yet..............{{summoner:2}} 
Can anyone bust the myth that ARAM keydrops are glitched?????
yea
{{champion:86}}
Anyone else noticed players not more likely to surrender in normals? The realisation that you're not going to get to S- seems to speed it up.......not good if you are going 9-0-3............
yeah just had that 1/0/12 soraka got an A and the game before that i got A+ with a shit score
cuz it is based off other people's performance on that champ and 12 assist on raka is pretty low

What he means is that you are way ahead, other team surrenders because they have no chance of an S and you don't get one either. Hence, greater tendency to surrender ruins it for all......well that's what I meant.

Does anyone know what the 'Next chest available in 6 days' in the profile means?
I remember reading somewhere that you could earn a chest a week, but I've earned 3 today (excluding the Riot gifted one) and I'm kind of confused.

"You can earn up to four chests at a time, with one chest slot regenerating each week. Purchasing chests doesn’t contribute to this limit, so even after earning four chests in a week, you can purchase another. You can purchase up to 25 chests per day."

You earn 1 chest per week, however they have a stack of up to 4 (which starts full) of which you can earn, so you've earned 3/4 of the starting chests and can still earn 1 and will get your next chance to earn one in 6 days.
What skins CAN'T you get.

"Cosmetic shards can be any non-limited skin. This means you might find DJ Sona, but you won’t find Victorious Jarvan IV. You can find a list of [excluded content here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201752944#h2)."
Complete Hextech Crafting guide can be found here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

I got Hyena Warwick, Winning.

is it possible to get 1,350/Legendary/Ultimate skins? {{champion:13}}

"Cosmetic shards can be any non-limited skin. This means you might find DJ Sona, but you won’t find Victorious Jarvan IV. You can find a list of excluded content [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201752944#h2)."

Complete Hextech Crafting guide can be found here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

These are the skins that are NOT included https://support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201752944#h2
Do I have any more chances to get limited skins? It's so pity for people who were not playing LOL when those skins were on sale.
How do you achieve a S rank as a support? :/

Many assists, don't ks too much, try and play off-meta champs if you can (6/9/22 as Azir supp, got an S-), also try and get cs (I know it might sound strange but it helps quite a bit), try and do more damage than an average supp (usually better if you play a poke support like Karma or Annie) and generally play smart. I'm not sure if placing wards helps but you can always test it yourself! Good Luck in the Rift! :D

Earn up to 4 chests per month with an even lower combined limit per season.

Or pay about 2$ per chest in the store and get as many as you want!
Limited to 25 chests a day, but still, theoretically you can buy as much as your bank account can hold.
Does re-rolling a skin cost anything or is it completely free?

Completely free, though it will cost 3 skin shards to convert into a permanent skin shard, which can be any skin in the game (except limited skins, e.g. Victorious Skins, PAX Skins, Championship Riven, etc.) if luck is on your side then you'll get a skin you like, if not tough luck. Good Luck! :D

Can be any skin you don't own. I got suckered into re-rolling three skins into a Sona skin which I don't have any intention of owning for quite a while. Better to cash them in for essence and wait for a skin shard you want.
